S.FORM: Cyrus Arnold kawas tay 2003, ryax sa tay 2 nqu tay 1, Cyrus Arnold, squliq na Bunge'. qyanux nya Arnold htagan beh Cyalifuniyaco,bobngk' (Burbank,California ).hiya cyux qutux sswe mlikuy nya. mincyogun nya spat kawas nya lga baq balay mzyugi ru mqwas. mhtuw beh teribi krryax Cyrus Arnold qasa.
